tag-1: Citi Panama Organizes Forum, "Panama Connecting the World"
tag-3: Panama City, Panama – Citi Panama, known for its excellence and for offering innovative global services, invited its clients to a forum entitled, "Panama Connecting the World."
tag-4: Designed to promote the treasury market and share best practices as applied to strategic sectors of the Panamanian economy, the event featured the participation of high-level Citi representatives and special guests.
tag-5: Among the government officials attending were the Vice Minister of Economics and Finance, Ivan Zarak, and Trade and Industry Minister Augusto Arosemena.
tag-6: A number of prominent companies also sent representatives. Executives from Proctor & Gamble, Nestle, Quala, Under Armour, the Panama Canal Authority, Copa Airlines, Manzanillo International Port, Tocumen, the Panama Canal Railway Company, and Targow Grupo Eurasia of Venezuela, Ecuador, Central America and the Caribbean shared their valuable experience managing their companies' treasury operations.
tag-7: Three Citi executives—Oscar Mazza, Trade and Treasury Director for Latin America; Gustavo Martinez, Director of Markets & Security for Latin America and the Caribbean; and Valentina Antill, Director of Strategic Risk Solutions—led the discussion panels.
tag-8: "As part of our vision for generating progress and development, we are pleased to offer spaces such as this one to provide more information about the economic context, new platforms and trends, and other topics of interest," said Marcelo Gorrini, Executive Director of Citi Panama. "We are proud to offer innovative solutions that meet the needs of corporations in every sector, with the experience to manage their financial transactions anywhere in the world."
tag-9: At the event, the panelists and special guests discussed new treasury practices and trends, global platforms that make a range of products available on the local market, and the services Citi offers its clients.
